question: Which regulator has imposed a fine of Rs.1 crore on former MD& CEO of Yes Bank, Rana Kapoor?
explanation:
The markets regulator SEBI (Securities and Exchange Board of India) has imposed a fine of Rs.1 crore on Rana Kapoor. He is the former MD& CEO of Yes Bank. He has been penalized for non-disclosure of encumbrance on the bankâ€™s shares.
The issue pertains to a transaction of Morgan Credits Pvt Ltd - an unlisted promoter entity of Yes Bank, which raised a sum of Rs.950 crore from Reliance Mutual Fund using Zero Coupon Non-Convertible Debentures.
